languages.text: "К сожалению, сделать это будет не просто. Некоторое время назад {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропаты{/g} Даргонуса впали в бешенство, и их пришлось... усмирить. Мы постепенно восстанавливаем нашу способность говорить с сопредельными мирами, однако контакты все еще слабы, а маршруты спутались и более не ведут в привычные капитанам системы. Учитывая, что подавляющее большинство кораблей флота Даргонус путешествуют, не полагаясь на услуги {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигаторов{/g}, без вашего вмешательства благополучие династии фон Валанциус и миллиардов ее подданных находится под угрозой".

traits.locale_text: "К сожалению, сделать это будет не просто. Некоторое время назад астропаты Даргонуса впали в бешенство, и их пришлось... усмирить. Мы постепенно восстанавливаем нашу способность говорить с сопредельными мирами, однако контакты все еще слабы, а маршруты спутались и более не ведут в привычные капитанам системы. Учитывая, что подавляющее большинство кораблей флота Даргонус путешествуют, не полагаюсь на услуги Навигаторов, без вашего вмешательства благополучие династии фон Валанциус и миллиардов ее подданных находится под угрозой".

languages.text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, сделать это будет не просто. Некоторое время назад {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропаты{/g} Даргонуса впали в бешенство, и их пришлось... усмирить. Мы постепенно восстанавливаем нашу способность говорить с сопредельными мирами, однако контакты все еще слабы, а маршруты спутались и более не ведут в привычные капитанам системы. Учитывая, что подавляющее большинство кораблей флота Даргонус путешествуют, не полагаясь на услуги {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигаторов{/g}, без вашего вмешательства благополучие династии фон Валанциус и миллиардов ее подданных находится под угрозой".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the Astropaths of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighboring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of Navigators — without your engagement, the wellbeing of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

"Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the Astropaths of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighboring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of Navigators — without your engagement, the wellbeing of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

"Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

"Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

languages.text: “遗憾的是，这个目标恐怕没那么容易实现。不久之前，达戈努斯的{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}们突然发了疯，我们不得不将他们……制服。尽管我们现在正在慢慢恢复与邻近世界沟通的能力，但沟通能力依然很弱。航线也变得乱七八糟，无法抵达舰长原本期望的目的地。鉴于达戈努斯海军绝大部分舰船都是在没有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的情况下航行，如果没有您的协助，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝以及其数十亿臣民的福祉，恐怕就要处于危险之中了。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，这个目标恐怕没那么容易实现。不久之前，达戈努斯的{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}们突然发了疯，我们不得不将他们……制服。尽管我们现在正在慢慢恢复与邻近世界沟通的能力，但沟通能力依然很弱。航线也变得乱七八糟，无法抵达舰长原本期望的目的地。鉴于达戈努斯海军绝大部分舰船都是在没有{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}的情况下航行，如果没有您的协助，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝以及其数十亿臣民的福祉，恐怕就要处于危险之中了。”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, no será tarea fácil. Hace poco, los {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g} de Dargonus fueron presa de un arrebato y tuvimos que... apaciguarlos. Estamos restaurando las comunicaciones con los mundos vecinos paulatinamente, pero los contactos aún son débiles y las rutas están enmarañadas y no conducen adonde esperan los capitanes. Dado que la mayoría de naves de la marina de Dargonus viajan sin depender de {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}, sin su ayuda correrá peligro el bienestar de las dinastía von Valancius y de sus miles de millones de súbditos».
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, no será tarea fácil. Hace poco, los {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g} de Dargonus fueron presa de un arrebato y tuvimos que... apaciguarlos. Estamos restaurando las comunicaciones con los mundos vecinos paulatinamente, pero los contactos aún son débiles y las rutas están enmarañadas y no conducen adonde esperan los capitanes. Dado que la mayoría de naves de la marina de Dargonus viajan sin depender de {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}, sin su ayuda correrá peligro el bienestar de las dinastía von Valancius y de sus miles de millones de súbditos».

languages.text: 「無論、容易ではないでしょう。しばらく前にダルゴナスの{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}が激怒し…鎮圧する必要がございました。隣接する惑星と対話する能力を徐々に取り戻しつつありますが、通信はまだ弱く、航路は複雑になり、中隊長が望む星系との繋がりは隔たれたままです。ダルゴナス海軍の大半の船が{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}に頼らずに航行していることを考慮すると、あなたの関与がなければフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と何十億もの臣下の幸福が、現在脅威にさらされていると言えます」
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: 「無論、容易ではないでしょう。しばらく前にダルゴナスの{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}が激怒し…鎮圧する必要がございました。隣接する惑星と対話する能力を徐々に取り戻しつつありますが、通信はまだ弱く、航路は複雑になり、中隊長が望む星系との繋がりは隔たれたままです。ダルゴナス海軍の大半の船が{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}に頼らずに航行していることを考慮すると、あなたの関与がなければフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と何十億もの臣下の幸福が、現在脅威にさらされていると言えます」

languages.text: "Leider wird das keine einfache Aufgabe. Vor einiger Zeit begehrten die {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathen{/g} von Dargonus auf und mussten ... gebändigt werden. Die Verständigung mit den Nachbarwelten wird gerade Stück für Stück wiederhergestellt, aber noch sind die Kontakte schwach und die Routen verworren, sodass sie nicht mehr zu den Systemen führen, die die Captains erwarten. Da der Großteil der Schiffsflotte von Dargonus ohne die Dienste von {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} operiert, ist aktuell ohne Eure Mithilfe das Wohlbefinden der Dynastie von Valancius und seiner Milliarden Untertanen gefährdet."
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: "Leider wird das keine einfache Aufgabe. Vor einiger Zeit begehrten die {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathen{/g} von Dargonus auf und mussten ... gebändigt werden. Die Verständigung mit den Nachbarwelten wird gerade Stück für Stück wiederhergestellt, aber noch sind die Kontakte schwach und die Routen verworren, sodass sie nicht mehr zu den Systemen führen, die die Captains erwarten. Da der Großteil der Schiffsflotte von Dargonus ohne die Dienste von {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} operiert, ist aktuell ohne Eure Mithilfe das Wohlbefinden der Dynastie von Valancius und seiner Milliarden Untertanen gefährdet."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, il faut admettre que ce ne sera pas là une tâche aisée. Il y a quelque temps, les {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathes{/g} de Dargonus se sont rebellés et ont dû être... matés. Nous rétablissons peu à peu le dialogue avec les mondes voisins, mais ces prises de contact sont encore fragiles, et les routes empruntées par les capitaines ne mènent pas toujours à la destination attendue. À moins d'une intervention de votre part, et considérant que la grande majorité des vaisseaux de la marine de Dargonus ne disposent pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g}, je crains que le bien-être de la dynastie von Valancius et de milliards de ses sujets ne soit en grand péril. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, il faut admettre que ce ne sera pas là une tâche aisée. Il y a quelque temps, les {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathes{/g} de Dargonus se sont rebellés et ont dû être... matés. Nous rétablissons peu à peu le dialogue avec les mondes voisins, mais ces prises de contact sont encore fragiles, et les routes empruntées par les capitaines ne mènent pas toujours à la destination attendue. À moins d'une intervention de votre part, et considérant que la grande majorité des vaisseaux de la marine de Dargonus ne disposent pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g}, je crains que le bien-être de la dynastie von Valancius et de milliards de ses sujets ne soit en grand péril. »

languages.text: "Elbette bu kolay bir vazife olmayacak. Bir süre önce Dargonus {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropatları{/g} öfke krizine girdi ve bastırılmaları gerekti. Komşu dünyalarla konuşma yeteneğimizi yavaş yavaş geri kazansak da irtibat hâlâ zayıf. Ayrıca rotalar iç içe geçmiş durumda, kaptanların umdukları sistemlere gitmiyorlar artık. Dargonus donanmasındaki gemilerin çoğunluğunun {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacıların{/g} hizmetleri olmadan yolculuk ettiği düşünülürse... Müdahale etmediğiniz takdirde von Valancius hanedanlığı ve milyarlarca tebaasının refahı tehlikede olacak."
languages.original_text: "Alas, it won't be an easy task to accomplish. Some time ago, the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropaths{/g} of Dargonus flew into a rage, and they had to be... subdued. We are gradually restoring our ability to speak with neighbouring worlds, but the contacts are still weak, and the routes are tangled and no longer lead to the systems that the captains expect them to. Given that the vast majority of ships in the Dargonus navy travel without relying on the services of {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} — without your engagement, the well-being of the von Valancius dynasty and billions of its subjects is presently at risk."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette bu kolay bir vazife olmayacak. Bir süre önce Dargonus {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropat{/g}ları bir öfke krizine girdiler ve bastırılmaları gerekti. Komşu dünyalarla konuşma yeteneğimizi yavaş yavaş geri kazanıyoruz ancak irtibat hâlâ zayıf. Ayrıca rotalar iç içe geçmiş durumda ve kaptanların bekledikleri sistemlere artık gitmiyorlar. Dargonus donanmasındaki gemilerin çoğunluğunun {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}ların hizmetleri olmadan yolculuk ettiği düşünülürse, müdahale etmediğiniz takdirde von Valancius hanedanlığı ve milyarlarca tebaası risk altında kalacak demektir."
